slides.title: Slide 4 Page Regions
slides.contents:
# Page Header
`<header></header>`
![Page header](https://www.w3.org/WAI/tutorials/img/page-structure-header-28e521ee.png)

# Page Footer
`<footer></footer>`
![footer](https://www.w3.org/WAI/tutorials/img/page-structure-footer-fbaedb8f.png)

## If the `<footer>` or `<header>` are inside a `<article>` `<section>` they are not identified as belonging to the page - but to that section

# Navigation
`<nav></nav>`
![nav](https://www.w3.org/WAI/tutorials/img/page-structure-navigation-529bca1f.png)

# Main
`<main></main>`
![main](https://www.w3.org/WAI/tutorials/img/page-structure-main-7bc6392c.png)

# Aside
`<aside></aside>`
![aside](https://www.w3.org/WAI/tutorials/img/page-structure-aside-6c081801.png)

slides.contents:
